channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter between Elmbridge Court Roundabout and Junction 10 M5, 25th January
item.description:
Litter lining the road all the way from the roundabout to the motorway junction. Both sides of the road and some on central reservation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Whole section of road littered with pot holes, 25th January
item.description:

item.title: Pothole very deep outside 114 Greenhills Road. Caused a burst tyre . This road is disintegrating and needs resurfacing , not just patching up, 25th January
item.description:
On the Eastbound side of Greenhills Road outside number 114. This hs been present fur a few weeks and the road surface is deteriorating to the extent where the pothole caused me a burst tyre

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Woodlands Road pot holes, 25th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Woodlands Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
